name: allCollections
description: The `/collections` endpoint returns a list of all [collections](https://www.getpostman.com/docs/collections) that are accessible by you. The list includes your own collections and the collections that you have subscribed to. The response contains an array of collection information containing the `name`, `id`, `owner` and `uid` of each collection. > Requires API Key as `X-Api-Key` request header or `apikey` URL query parameter.
